Title: Relates to coverage for cancer screenings
Summary: Relates to requiring coverage for volunteer firefighters for full cancer screenings upon entry of service to a fire department or fire company and annually thereafter; provides that the costs of such screenings shall be covered by the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, Vol Ffs Ben L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the volunteer firefighters' benefit law, in relation to coverage for cancer screenings
